availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Anderson Barlow (Nicholas County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer.)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Leason Barlow and Nancy Barlow. Married to Mary A. Hasty Barlow in Nicholas County, Kentucky, on July 4, 1854. Father of Mary F. Barlow, Mariah Jane Barlow, Milton F. Barlow, Bettie Barlow, Ann B. Barlow, and John B. Barlow. Laborer in Nicholas County in 1860. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 413B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 12.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, Precinct 2, p. 226A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Nicholas County, KY, July1863, p. 4.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #24261.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994051, Nicholas County Births/Marriages/Deaths.
